room_title: Escape room "Going Insane" by Escape 101 in Danbury
room_description: Welcome to your new home. At Bellevue Asylum, we have a long history of providing care and rehabilitation for patients who suffer from a wide range of mental afflictions. You’ve been arrested and brought to us under the authority of a well respected government official who has personally recommended that you are placed under our care until you are ‘made better’. A task that we’re fully dedicated to- even if it takes a lifetime.
